title: The "Manikyam Kangan": Exquisite Ruby and Diamond Bangle
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish; Oval-cut Ruby (approx. 3 carats)
VS Clarity - approx. 2.5 carats total weight)
features: Intricate filigree (jali) work surrounding the central ruby; meticulously handcrafted floral and vine motifs embellished with diamonds; secure pressure-fit opening mechanism integrated into the design for comfortable wear and secure fastening. This bangle beautifully blends traditional Indian aesthetics with a modern open-bangle design.
colors: Warm yellow gold complements the vibrant red ruby and the sparkling white diamonds
creating a rich and regal color palette.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi
and as a treasured heirloom for future generations. Its timeless elegance makes it also suitable for contemporary high-profile events.
description: This bangle is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a lustrous finish, enhancing its richness. The combination of rubies and diamonds symbolizes prosperity, love, and commitment, making it a meaningful and cherished piece. The openable design ensures comfort and ease of wear, while the secure locking mechanism provides peace of mind.
